channel.title: [SINGLEPLAYER] Player Death Sounds Not Playing
channel.description:
Two different death sounds for the player aren't working in singleplayer:
* [b]HEV Vox[/b]: The "beeping flatline" sentence sequence of the HEV suit voice isn't playing whenever the player dies, at any point during the game. * [b]Falling Death[/b]: The crunching sound of the Player.FallGib effect isn't playing whenever the player dies from falling. Instead, the normal "non-death" Player.FallDamage plays in its place.

item.title: [SINGLEPLAYER] Player Death Sounds Not Playing
item.dc:creator: Shask
item.description:
Two different death sounds for the player aren’t working in singleplayer:

  • HEV Vox: The “beeping flatline” sentence sequence of the HEV suit voice isn’t playing whenever the player dies, at any point during the game.
  • Falling Death: The crunching sound of the Player.FallGib effect isn’t playing whenever the player dies from falling. Instead, the normal “non-death” Player.FallDamage plays in its place.

Read full topic
